data.title: March 5, 2024, Presidential Primary Election: Candidates on the Ballot
data.meta_description: Candidates who have filed for office in the March 5, 2024, Presidential Primary Election. Updated every 1-2 business days.
data.text:
Party-Nominated Offices

American Independent Party

President of the United States

Note: Presidential candidates do not have ballot designations.

Candidate Name Statement JAMES BRADLEY None submitted

Democratic Party

President of the United States

Note: Presidential candidates do not have ballot designations.

Note: Central committee candidates cannot submit statements.
